lead_paragraph: This proposal, out of Britain, reminds me of President Obama's campaign idea to give students financial aid for participating in community service projects:
snippet: A new program in Britain will reward people with "points," redeemable with local vendors, for doing good deeds like picking up litter.

headline.main: Getting Paid to Be a Good Citizen

abstract: A new program in Britain will reward people with "points," redeemable with local vendors, for doing good deeds like picking up litter.
